messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Getting started on Holt's books.
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Ren, Didn t even know those things were there, can I borrow from them for the new BCUnschoolers list I started recently? let me know, Sherri-Lee _____
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Ren,



Didn't even know those things were there, can I borrow from them for the new
BCUnschoolers list I started recently?


let me know,


Sherri-Lee



_____

From: Ren Allen [mailto:starsuncloud@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 01, 2004 10:54 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Getting started on Holt's books.



Don't forget to check out the various links at the actual
unschoolingbasics site. Just click on "links" on the left, and
you'll get a few different websites that have many, many book
recommendations and descriptions.

Ren
